changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE claims ( id UUID DEFAULT RANDOM_UUID() PRIMARY KEY, claim_number VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, consumer VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, employer VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, date_of_service DATE NOT NULL, plan VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL );
